Title: Pusher
Plot: Mulder and Scully are asked to help in a case involving Robert Patrick Modell, a murderer possessing the psychic ability to force his will onto people. Due to a brain tumor that is slowly killing him, he is searching for a "worthy adversary" and forces Mulder into a battle of mind over matter.
GuestStars: Julia Arkos, Roger R. Cross, Steve Bacic, Don MacKay, Brent Sheppard, D. Neil Mark, Meredith Bain Woodward, Ernie Foort, Darren Lucas, Janyse Jaud, Henry Watson, Robert Wisden, Vic Polizos
